executable.title: Image Grid Generator
executable.description: Constructs a binary grid image useful for visualizing the transforms resulting from image registration.
executable.contributor: Nick Tustison (algorithm), Andriy Fedorov (Slicer wrapping). fedorov AT bwh harvard edu

double.name: gridThickness
double.description: Grid line thickness specified in pixels of input template image
double.label: Thickness of grid lines

integer-vector.name: nControlPoints
integer-vector.description: How many grid lines there should be in each dimension of the image
integer-vector.label: Number of control points

image.name: inputImage
image.label: Input Image
image.description: Input image to be used as a template for the grid image. The grid image will exist in the same space as the input image.
